name: A Gift For Her
description:
: This is my second real attempt at a complete game, and my first Unity game! Any feedback is very welcome and very wanted. This game was completed with 1 day left in the jam, as I felt like I reached my conclusion. I learned so much this time.

Known Issues:
- Hitboxes are a little wonky, not sure how to make sure they trigger without clicking often.
- Cutscenes at the end don't render the tiles correctly and I'm unsure why. I'm using a pixel perfect camera and the same way I render the game, yet it still shows strangely.
